means: 用沙哑的声音或嗓音发音（throat的过去式与过去分词形式）

sentence.Network_en: This is the Blue - throated, a beautiful bird and magnificent flyer.
sentence.Network_cn: 照片上这种是蓝喉的, 华美的一种鸟.

sentence.Network_en: He offered a full - throated defense of the interest - rate policies he championed.
sentence.Network_cn: 但格林斯潘却对他在任期间推行的利率政策进行了全力辩护.

sentence.Network_en: Chinese deciduous shrub with yellow - throated pinkish flowers and bristly fruit; often cultivated as an ornamental.
